name: Phono
technology: Node.js, MongoDB, Firebase, Express.js , react ,react-router-dom ,react-spring, react rating, react-bootstrap, Material-UI,CSS, font Awesome .
overview1: This is an online mobile phone purchase application.
overview2: User: Email & password login and registration system, server included. Only users can see and delete their orders.
overview3: Admin: With this secrete email:admin@admin.com pass:123456 user will have access to the admin panel, admin can add or remove products and also can manage all orders including delete any order. An admin can make another admin using an email.

name: Travellers Paradise
technology: Node.js, MongoDB, Firebase, Express.js , react ,react-router-dom ,react-spring, react rating, react-bootstrap, CSS, font Awesome .
overview1: This project is a single page web application which is an online travel package booking system.
overview2: This project is developed using react-router-dom, react-spring, react-rating, react-Bootstrap, css, fortawesome etc.This web site has navbar, packages , team , my orders, 404 error page and a footer.
overview3: For booking any service, user have to login first.User can login using email and password or Google login.User will able to ses their orders and can delete if they change their mind but they have to login first.
